stimulusHtml: The material prosperity evident in Image 1 was in part attributable to which of the following?

features.html:
• Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the following two images.

Image 1: “The Playroom,” an etching by German painter Johann Michael Voltz, showing a mother and her children, 1823

 

bpk, Berlin / Staatliche Museen zu Berlin / Knud Petersen / Art Resource, NY

Image 2: German political cartoon, 1848

bpk, Berlin / Art Resource, NY

CARTOON CAPTION:

Wife: “Ludwig, take care of the child, I am going to my political club.”

Husband: “OK, dear. When are you coming back home?”

Wife: “Don’t worry about that; just go to bed.”

choicesHtml: The social welfare policies instituted by governments of the German states
The increasing standard of living of German industrial workers
The adoption by the Frankfurt Parliament of a liberal constitution for Germany
The restoration of political stability in the aftermath of the Congress of Vienna
